title: Adding the relative URLs to solve issues from initial checkout and links...
description: Adding the relative URLs to solve issues from initial checkout and links throwing a 404, details were here on how to fix, credit to @kieran-mace https://gitlab.com/brownfield-dev/remote/feedback/-/issues/2

notes.note:
Thanks for submitting this!

Is this the case when not using a bare domain name?  I went directly to my custom "handbook.brownfield.dev" domain so having the project path in the middle was not accounted for.

merge_request_diff_commits.message: Adding the relative URLs to solve issues from initial checkout and links throwing a 404, details were here on how to fix, credit to @kieran-mace https://gitlab.com/brownfield-dev/remote/feedback/-/issues/2

merge_request_diff_files.utf8_diff:
@@ -2,6 +2,7 @@ baseURL = "https://handbook.brownfield.dev/"
 languageCode = "en-us"
 title = "Suddenly Remote Handbook"
 theme = "book"
+relativeUrls=true
 
 disablePathToLower = false
 enableGitInfo = true
